issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h2. Original conversation

https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/appc-ti-alloy/-t5GdlgVOwE 

We should also implement a <FlexSpace/> parser for convenience. Also, a test app should be created to show how to use this.

h2. Proposed Syntax

{code:xml}
<Alloy>
    <Toolbar>
        <!-- UI elements for the "items" property -->
        <Items>
            <Button/>
            <FlexSpace/>
            <Button/>
        </Items>

        <!-- normal child elements of the Toolbar -->
        <ImageView/>
    </Toolbar>
</Alloy>
{code}
